alert.note: Alert for Garden (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 8:28PM CDT until July 30 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN GARDEN COUNTY... At 728 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Antioch, or 12 miles southeast of Alliance, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Crescent Lake National Wildlife Refuge, Miles Lake, Richardson Lake, Deer Lake, Mumper and Tralnor Lake. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
